title: Ticket #3456: DAGMan does unnecessary log file consistency sleeps w/ workflow log
description: When using the single workflow log file for all of the node jobs, DAGMan still does sleeps for user log consistency, which it doesn't need to do. This should be a real easy fix...
check_ins: 2013-Jan-24 17:23   Check-in [34747]: Gittrac #3456: fixed and documented this (DAGMan no longer does sleeps for log file consistency when using a single default/workflow log). (By Kent Wenger )
creator: wenger
